title: Ticket #7115: Ongoing consolidation of DAGMan code into dagman_utils
description: In #6804 we moved a bunch of DAGMan code into a utility library called dagman_utils. The point of this was to make this code available to the python bindings, where we are building some tools to integrate more closely with DAGMan. I should not have resolved the previous ticket because this is going to be a long work in progress, likely for the duration of the 8.9 series. As such I'm not attaching this ticket to a release, and will tag all upcoming code commits accordingly.
check_ins: 2019-Jun-19 10:26   Check-in [57169]: Moved more condor_dagman code into dagman_utils (#7115) (By Mark Coatsworth )
creator: coatsworth
